courseDetails.shortDescription: Step by step guitar course. 5 minute lessons. Learn to play chords, melodies, warm up exercises, music theory...
targetAudiences: Students who never touched a guitar before. This course was constructed with the absolute beginner in mind. Lessons are gradually introducing new materials and constantly repeating previous ones.

Beginner guitar players who doesn't feel sure about some basic things - in this course, each and every detail is explained. Left and right hand technique, writing and reading easy sheet music and chord charts as well as basic music theory behind it.
If you don't have much time and want to learn guitar, this course is for you. Lessons are short and you will need 15 to 30 minutes to complete each lesson (and learn a new skill).

The CISSP Exam course is designed for information security professionals who want to enhance their knowledge and skills in the field of information security and prepare for the CISSP certification exam.

The course is ideal for security consultants, security managers, security auditors, IT directors, network architects, and other professionals who are responsible for ensuring the security of their organization's data and systems.
The course is also suitable for individuals who are looking to advance their careers in the field of information security and want to demonstrate their expertise by achieving the CISSP certification.

Business professionals who work with IT: This course is also suitable for business professionals who work closely with IT and want to understand how IT Service Management can help align IT services with business objectives.

IT students: Finally, this course is for anyone pursuing a career in IT or studying IT-related topics. The ITIL 4 framework is an essential part of IT Service Management, and this course can help students build a strong foundation of knowledge and skills in this area.
